data.original: We address this challenge by introducing real valued non volume preserving (real NVP) transformations, a tractable yet expressive approach to modeling high dimensional data.
data.summary: Introduced real NVP transformations for high-dimensional data modeling.

data.original: This model can perform efficient and exact inference, sampling, and log density estimation of data points.
data.summary: Achieved efficient and exact inference, sampling, and log density estimation.

data.original: Moreover, the architecture presented in this paper enables exact and efficient reconstruction of input images from the hierarchical features extracted by this model.
data.summary: Enabled exact and efficient image reconstruction from hierarchical features.

data.original: We demonstrate its ability to model natural images on four datasets through sampling, log likelihood evaluation, and latent variable manipulation.
data.summary: Demonstrated the model's effectiveness on four datasets through various evaluations and manipulations.
